metadata.title: CVE-2024-39705 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: NLTK through 3.8.1 allows remote code execution if untrusted packages havepickled Python code, and the integrated data package download functionalityis used. This affects, for example, averaged_perceptron_tagger and punkt.

criterions.comment: nltk package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
